verses.verse: Prayer for Vindication To the leader: with stringed instruments. A Maskil of David, when the Ziphites went and told Saul, “David is in hiding among us.” (2 Chr 20.6; Ps 20.1) Save me, O God, by your name, and vindicate me by your might.
(Ps 5.1; 55.1) Hear my prayer, O God; give ear to the words of my mouth.
(Ps 36.1; 40.14; 86.14) For the insolent have risen against me; the ruthless seek my life; they do not set God before them. Selah
(Ps 41.12; 118.7) But surely, God is my helper; the Lord is the upholder of (Gk Syr Jerome: Heb is of those who uphold or is with those who uphold) my life.
(Ps 89.49; 94.23; 143.12) He will repay my enemies for their evil. In your faithfulness, put an end to them.
(Ps 50.14; 52.9) With a freewill offering I will sacrifice to you; I will give thanks to your name, O LORD, for it is good.
(Ps 34.6; 59.10) For he has delivered me from every trouble, and my eye has looked in triumph on my enemies.
